name: Let me go 2: Simulation
description:
You do NOT have to play the first game to understand this one!

Story:

You are a soldier in the year 2089 captured by some unknown entity. You must fight in his new arena, the simulation.

I did not make the floor texture or music

Controls:

Move: WASD

Scroll Camera: Scroll wheel

Shoot: Mouse1

Aim: Mouse2

Run: LShift

Reload: R
